caption: "It s the Super Bowl for our scouts," Coyotes General Manager Don Maloney says of the NHL Draft, which is this Friday and Saturday in Philadelphia. caption: The Coyotes are holding on-ice workouts for their 2013 Prospect Development Camp at the Ice Den in Scottsdale Today, Wednesday and Thursday (from 2:15-3:45 p.m.). The workouts are open to the public and free of charge.
caption_raw: The Coyotes are holding on-ice workouts for their 2013 Prospect Development Camp at the Ice Den in Scottsdale Today, Wednesday and Thursday (from 2:15-3:45 p.m.). The workouts are open to the public and free of charge.

caption: The Coyotes will hold the on-ice sessions of their 2013 Prospect Development Camp this Tuesday-Thursday at the Ice Den in Scottsdale. All on-ice sessions will be from 2:15 to 3:45 p.m. and are free and open to the public. Among the prospects expected to attend the camp include first-round draft choices Max Domi (2013), Henrik Samuelsson (2012), Connor Murphy (2011), Brandon Gormley (2010) and Mark Visentin (2010).
caption_raw: The Coyotes will hold the on-ice sessions of their 2013 Prospect Development Camp this Tuesday-Thursday at the Ice Den in Scottsdale. All on-ice sessions will be from 2:15 to 3:45 p.m. and are free and open to the public. Among the prospects expected to attend the camp include first-round draft choices Max Domi (2013), Henrik Samuelsson (2012), Connor Murphy (2011), Brandon Gormley (2010) and Mark Visentin (2010).
